page.title: 06EDUCATION Other schools.
page.content:
Children from Aston-le-Walls attend schools in other places. 1. Children from Aston attend Chipping Warden Primary School. 2. Secondary pupils attend either Chenderit County Secondary School, at Middleton Cheney, or 3. Blessed George Napier R.C. Secondary School, Banbury. 4. 2 boys attend a boarding preparatory school in Brackley, 5. 2 boys attend Princethorpe College.
The Full-time students attend*- 1. Aston University, Birmingham; 2. King Alfred's College, Winchester; 3. Agricultural colleges.
